channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple WWDC Live Blog: All the Updates, as They Happen
item.description: Follow our WWDC 2025 live blog for all of the updates coming to iOS, macOS, watchOS, and more.

item.title: Best Treadmill for Home (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Putting a treadmill in your home can help you stick to your workout plan. We ran for miles and miles on the most popular models to help your choose th...

item.title: iOS 19: All the rumored changes Apple could be bringing to its new operating system
item.description: As Apple prepares to unveil iOS 19 at WWDC 2025, several rumors have surfaced, including a potential new name for the operating system and more.

item.title: Meta reportedly in talks to invest billions of dollars in Scale AI
item.description: Meta is discussing a multi-billion dollar investment in Scale AI, according to Bloomberg. In fact, the deal value could reportedly exceed $10 billion,...

item.title: 15 Best Gifts for Men, Manly Men, and Menly Man Men (2025)
item.description: When you need something that's as mannishly masculinized as you can get for the Man™ in your life, we have you covered.

item.title: How to Advocate for Trans Rights in Your Community
item.description: Want to push back against the bigoted attacks targeting trans and gender-nonconforming people? Here are specific ways you can help—with your time, mon...

item.title: WWDC 2025: What to expect from this year’s conference
item.description: At WWDC 2025, Apple will likely focus on the next iOS, which is rumored to have the most significant design change since the introduction of iOS 7.

item.title: Axiom Space prepares for its fourth mission to the ISS
item.description: Axiom Space plans to launch its fourth mission on Tuesday, June 10 — a mission that CEO Tejpaul Bhatia described as “a little bit of a victory lap.”

item.title: How to Buy a Bike Helmet (2025)
item.description: What is rotational impact? When do you have to replace your helmet? Here’s what to look for when shopping for a bike helmet.

item.title: Pioneering Apple engineer Bill Atkinson dies at 74
item.description: Bill Atkinson, an engineer who played a key role in the development of the Macintosh and other landmark Apple products, has died of pancreatic cancer.
